title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - What's Next for Canelo Álvarez?
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - What's Next for Canelo Álvarez?
description:
Joining Chris this week is friend of the pod, Keith Idec. Chris and Keith dive into a number of different topics starting with the best cruiserweight in boxing calling out Jake Paul, the latest with Bud Crawford, and the end to his relationship with Top Rank, and finally the question that everyone wants to know, what's next for Canelo Álvarez?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
